windTurbineMKCV

Class WindTurbine

  • java.lang.Object
    • windTurbineMKCV.WindTurbine

  • public class WindTurbine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is meant for creating WindTurbine objects, effectively modeling a wind turbine with a given radius, number of blades and tip speed ratio.

    This class also provides the necessary methods to compute the efficiency of a HAWT wind turbine iteratively in terms of power coefficient, Cp, using blade element momentum theory.
    Version:
    05/19/2016
    Author:
    Mitchell Keeley, Chaitanya Varier

    • Constructor Detail

      • WindTurbine

        public WindTurbine(double radius,
                   int numBlades,
                   double tipSpeedRatio)
        Constructor for instantiating WindTurbine objects, which model wind turbines with a given radius, number of blades and tip speed ratio.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the turbine in m.
        numBlades - The number of blades of the turbine.
        tipSpeedRatio - The tip speed ratio of the turbine at the blade tip.

    • Method Detail

      • getPowerCoefficient

        public double getPowerCoefficient()
        Calculates the coefficient of power, Cp, of the wind turbine instantiated by its respective WindTurbine object, using momentum theory.
        Returns:
        Coefficient of power, Cp, expressed in terms of % of total input wind power.

      • getChordLength

        private double getChordLength(double pos)
        Returns the chord length of the wind turbine airfoil at a particular radial position along the blade.
        Parameters:
        pos - The radial position of the current blade segment in m.
        Returns:
        The chord length at the current blade segment in m.

      • getTwist

        private double getTwist(double pos)
        Returns the local pitch angle (thetap), or twist of the wind turbine airfoil at a particular radial position along the blade. The pitch angle is defined as the angle between the chord line and the reference plane.
        Parameters:
        pos - The radial position of the current blade segment in m.
        Returns:
        The local pitch angle at the current blade segment in radians.
